head_html:
<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    var elements = document.getElementsByClassName("sign-up-message");

    for (var i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {
        var currentElement = elements[i];

        var signUpLink = currentElement.querySelector('a');
        if (signUpLink) {
            signUpLink.setAttribute('href', 'user-registration');
            var homeLink = document.createElement('a');
            homeLink.href = '/';
            homeLink.textContent = 'Home';
            currentElement.appendChild(document.createElement('br'));
            currentElement.appendChild(homeLink);
        }
    }
});
</script>
name: Website Settings
